Uses of Class
org.apache.freemarker.core.Configuration

  • Packages that use Configuration 
    Package Description
    org.apache.freemarker.core
    The most commonly used API-s of FreeMarker; start with Configuration (see also the Getting Stared in the Manual.)
    org.apache.freemarker.servlet
    Servlet for legacy "Model 2" frameworks that allows using FreeMarker templates instead of JSP as the MVC View (see in the Manual), also custom JSP tag support.
    org.apache.freemarker.spring
    Spring Framework (MVC) Support
    org.apache.freemarker.spring.web.view
    Spring Framework MVC View Support

    • Uses of Configuration in org.apache.freemarker.core

      Methods in org.apache.freemarker.core that return Configuration 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Configuration Configuration.ExtendableBuilder.build() 
      Configuration Environment.getConfiguration() 
      Configuration Template.getConfiguration()
      Returns the Configuration object associated with this template.
      Methods in org.apache.freemarker.core with parameters of type Configuration 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Template Template.createPlainTextTemplate(String lookupName, String content, Configuration config)
      Same as Template.createPlainTextTemplate(String, String, String, Configuration, Charset) with null sourceName argument.
      static Template Template.createPlainTextTemplate(String lookupName, String sourceName, String content, Configuration config, Charset sourceEncoding)
      Creates a Template that only contains a single block of static text, no dynamic content.
      abstract Template TemplateLanguage.parse(String name, String sourceName, Reader reader, Configuration cfg, TemplateConfiguration templateConfiguration, Charset encoding, InputStream streamToUnmarkWhenEncEstabd)
      See Template.Template(String, String, Reader, Configuration, TemplateConfiguration, Charset, InputStream).
      Constructors in org.apache.freemarker.core with parameters of type Configuration 
      Constructor and Description
      Template(String lookupName, Reader reader, Configuration cfg)
      Same as Template.Template(String, String, Reader, Configuration) with null sourceName parameter.
      Template(String lookupName, Reader reader, Configuration cfg, Charset sourceEncoding)
      Convenience constructor for Template(lookupName, null, reader, cfg, sourceEncoding).
      Template(String lookupName, String sourceCode, Configuration cfg)
      Convenience constructor for Template(lookupName, new StringReader(reader), cfg).
      Template(String lookupName, String sourceCode, Configuration cfg, TemplateConfiguration tc)
      Convenience constructor for Template(lookupName, null, new StringReader(reader), cfg), tc, null.
      Template(String lookupName, String sourceName, Reader reader, Configuration cfg)
      Constructs a template from a character stream.
      Template(String lookupName, String sourceName, Reader reader, Configuration cfg, Charset actualSourceEncoding)
      Same as Template.Template(String, String, Reader, Configuration), but also specifies the template's source encoding.
      Template(String lookupName, String sourceName, Reader reader, Configuration cfg, TemplateConfiguration templateConfiguration, Charset actualSourceEncoding)
      Same as Template.Template(String, String, Reader, Configuration, Charset), but also specifies a TemplateConfiguration.
      Template(String lookupName, String sourceName, Reader reader, Configuration cfg, TemplateConfiguration templateConfiguration, Charset actualSourceEncoding, InputStream streamToUnmarkWhenEncEstabd)
      Same as Template.Template(String, String, Reader, Configuration, TemplateConfiguration, Charset), but allows specifying the streamToUnmarkWhenEncEstabd.

    • Uses of Configuration in org.apache.freemarker.servlet

      Methods in org.apache.freemarker.servlet that return Configuration 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected Configuration FreemarkerServlet.getConfiguration()
      Returns the Configuration object used by this servlet.
      Methods in org.apache.freemarker.servlet with parameters of type Configuration 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void FreemarkerServlet.afterConfigurationBuilt(Configuration cfg)
      Hook for FreemarkerServlet subclasses to examine Configuration just after it was created.
